title: How can I change my name?
body:
Hey,
I am thinking about changing my ingame name, but idk how to do it... I know there used to be something in the shop, which let you change your name, but I can't seem to find it?
Am I just missing on something here? ^^'

replies.body: It is under my account at the top
Thanks, I found it! Now I only need enough IP...

Summoner name changes are still available, and located at the store!  When you select the store in your client, you'll see a small silhouette of a person on the top right.  To the right of PURCHASE RP.  This takes you to your account options that includes a summoner name change.  Let me know if that helps!

--Oh you found it!!  [Double IP weekend ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions)is coming up!

I already need those extra IP to gift Xayah to a friend >.< I guess my new name has to wait a little longer, I just hope nobody takes the name I want x)
On a little sidenote: I noticed there are quite a lot inactive accounts, which means that there are also quite a lot names taken away by some inactive players...I don't know if you are the right person to ask for this, but do you think that Riot can one day make the names from inactive accounts usable for all again?

Each account's summoner name is protected for a limited amount of time.  Per the [summoner name clean up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-) guide, the protection can last for a pretty long time depending on the account's level.  We aren't able to tell you when a name might be inactive, so you'll have to keep trying!  Good luck!
Ok, didn't knew about this. Thanks for the information! :)
